verbose_text: We show that HCoV-OC43 infection alters IL-6, TNF-alpha, and MCP-1 mRNA expression in infected astrocytes and upregulates NO production and MMP-2 and MMP-9 secretion in infected astrocytes and microglia.
evidence: HCoV-OC43 infection alters IL-6, TNF-alpha, and MCP-1 mRNA expression in infected astrocytes and upregulates NO
